page.title: 01GEOGRAPHY OF THE AREA
page.content: THE NORTHERN SECTION OF THE BLOCK TAKES IN THE EASTERN SLOPES OF THE SIDLAW HILLS.THE CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN SECTIONS TAKE IN HILL FARMS AND ARABLE LAND. THE LAND SURVEYED IS APPORTIONED AS FOLLOWS:- FARM PROPRIETOR COMPLETE:HUNTINGFAULDS T&C YOUNG NEW MAINS W DONALDSON MILL OF TEALING H HAGGART TINKLETAP S R CAMPBELL WHITEHOUSE W NICOLL&SONS BRIGHTY J MORRISON PART:BALCALK D S MILLAR KIRKTON W J MOWBRAY LEYSHADE R MILLAR MYRETON C COOK THE REMAINDER OF THE LAND IS DIVIDED UP INTO SMALL HOLDINGS.
